DOC.criteria: Biopsy proven prostate adenocarcinoma Stage : T1T2cN0M0 ECOG performance status : 02 Signed study specific inform consent prior study entry Postoperative residual recurrent tumor Evidence distant metastasis Previous irradiation tumor location Adjuvant antiandrogenic hormonal therapy High risk group ( NCCN guide line )
